text: 13.10 1 Ko 4.21, 2 Ko 2.3, 10.2, 10.8, 12.20-21, Tat 1.14 Adek anɨb ak nep, yad palawl okol mɨdɨl, nɨbop mɨj tɨk yokebin. Nɨbi mɨj anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, Bɨawl nop chɨg tep gɨl mɨdem nɨm, yad amjakɨl, takaw kɨles agɨnɨg nepin ak kelɨgɨnɨgayn. Bɨawl yɨp agek wog nop gɨpin tek, takaw kɨles ogɨnap agɨnɨg agɨnɨgayn. Pen wog agek gɨpin anɨb ak, kɨlop age apyap pakɨnɨgel agɨl ma agak. Kɨlop agɨl kɨles ñe, gos sek mɨdɨl jak tep gɨl yenɨgel agɨl agak ak gɨpin.
